title: 玩家无法领取地皮，后台刷错，SQLite错误
author: skyliye
txt_content:
这是哪里出问题了 玩家领地皮之后游戏里没反应  后台会刷这个错误
我用的是multicraft面板服务器
这是错误日志：
15.02 11:55:48 [Server] INFO Builder: 冒险家Dahaier15.02 11:55:50 [Server] INFO Dahaier issued server command: /p claim15.02 11:55:51 [Server] INFO ============ DATABASE ERROR ============15.02 11:55:51 [Server] INFO There was an error updating the database.15.02 11:55:51 [Server] INFO - It will be correct on shutdown15.02 11:55:51 [Server] INFO ========================================15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_CANTOPEN]  Unable to open the database file (unable to open database file)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.execute(DB.java:342)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.executeUpdate(DB.java:363)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.executeUpdate(PrepStmt.java:85)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at com.intellectualcrafters.plot.database.SQLManager$13.addBatch(SQLManager.java:1035)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at com.intellectualcrafters.plot.database.SQLManager.sendBatch(SQLManager.java:361)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at com.intellectualcrafters.plot.database.SQLManager$1.run(SQLManager.java:148)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)15.02 11:55:51 [Server] INFO ========================================

replies.txt_content: s把SQL关掉？？  还有  报错日志不完整 请给出当天的log文件

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
543589341 发表于 2018-2-15 14:16
s把SQL关掉？？  还有  报错日志不完整 请给出当天的log文件
在这之前和之后的日志都是正常的  没必要截的

skyliye 发表于 2018-2-15 14:19
在这之前和之后的日志都是正常的  没必要截的
你不给出 怎么看得见报错位置   这些报错根本看不出什么

replies.author: s8566597s
replies.txt_content:
尝试更新插件，删除那个database
不然是服务端不支持=。=？
